alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 17 at 4:17PM HST until December 18 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .The current north-northwest (340 degrees) swell will continue to decline tonight and should drop below advisory thresholds on Sunday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 15 to 20 feet lowering to 12 to 16 feet tonight. * WHERE...Portions of Kauai, Maui, Molokai, Niihau, Oahu and the Big Island Hawaii. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
